testCase.name: ToggleInputChildren should render the label and a switch component when rendered
ToggleInputChildren should toggle the switch component on click
ToggleInputChildren should set the default value of the switch component if defaultValue prop is not null
ToggleInputChildren should not set the default value of the switch component if defaultValue prop is null
ToggleInputChildren should call setValue and trigger with the correct inputName when the switch component is toggled
